articles.description: Reaction to Tuesday's Champions League action in matches involving Liverpool, Manchester City and Celtic plus Arsenal and Aston Villa build-up.
articles.title: Champions League LIVE: Reaction after Man City beaten by Sporting, Liverpool and Celtic win

articles.description: Manchester United's incoming head coach Ruben Amorim reflects on a dream departure from Sporting, but warns of "different world" in the Premier League.
articles.title: Ruben Amorim: Man Utd's new boss plays down expectations after beating Man City

articles.description: Xabi Alonso had been the chosen one among Liverpool fans to replace Jurgen Klopp, but Arne Slot has helped them move on with ease.
articles.title: Liverpool boss Arne Slot outshines Bayer Leverkusen's Xabi Alonso at Anfield

articles.description: Arsenal last faced Inter Milan in the Champions League 21 years ago - BBC Sport relives their 5-1 win at the San Siro.
articles.title: Remembering Arsenal's 5-1 Champions League win over Inter Milan at San Siro

articles.description: We look at six of the biggest storylines from the first half of the 2024 NFL season from the best and worst performers to who shows signs of being play-off dark horses.
articles.title: NFL mid-season review: Chiefs' dynasty, Jayden Daniels and Derrick Henry among six big storylines

articles.description: Karen Wiltshire was assaulted and ridiculed but went on to become the first professional female jockey to ride a winner in British Flat racing.
articles.title: Karen Wiltshire: Pioneering female jockey on overcoming abuse and ridicule

articles.description: Real Madrid fell to back-to-back home defeats and their second loss in the Champions League group stage as they were beaten by AC Milan at the Santiago Bernabeu.
articles.title: Real Madrid 1-3 AC Milan: Spaniards fall to second straight home loss

articles.description: Pep Guardiola insists he will come out fighting after Bernardo Silva says Manchester City are in a "dark place” following three successive defeats.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola insists he will fight on as Bernardo Silva says Man City in 'dark place'

articles.description: Nicolas Kuhn is described as the outstanding player in Scottish football this season after his two-goal display in Celtic's 3-1 Champions League win over RB Leipzig.
articles.title: Celtic 3-1 RB Leipzig: Nicolas Kuhn shows class with Champions League goals

articles.description: Philadelphia 76ers centre Joel Embiid is suspended for three games for pushing a journalist in reaction to a critical column.
articles.title: Joel Embiid: Philadelphia 76ers star suspended for shoving journalist
